I'm all for it I had to watch my husband die stage four brain Cancer that spread to all organs and bones to see him in so much pain and high doses of morphine to watch what he went through and reading about Brittany I say go for it the right to die with dignity God bless my heart goes out to you and all of you that are going through hell
